original_title: A Song's Best Friend - John Denver Remembered
overview: Close friends of John Denver and his first wife Annie remember the singer/ songwriter John Denver and his music. The interviewees tell personal stories about John Denver over a background of excerpts form his TV specials, films, concerts and home movies. The film also highlights John Denver's unwavering commitment to the environment, world peace and humanitarian causes
title: A Song's Best Friend - John Denver Remembered
